attributes.action: Support Dominic Grieve and prevent his deselection
attributes.background: Dominic Grieve has stood with integrity and honesty serving the people of this democratic nation. In an attempt to remove him and his views from Parliament, he is now facing deselection by a small number of Brexit backing conservatives. This cannot be permitted, this is not democracy.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of the Conservative party, not the UK Government or Parliament.
